titles.title: Neighborhood Crime Fighters Housing Assistance Act

To amend section 8 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide rental assistance to obtain new residences for families residing in dwelling units assisted under such section or in public housing, who provide information regarding criminal activity to law enforcement agencies and are subject to violence because of providing such information.

bill.summary: 3/24/1994--Introduced. Neighborhood Crime Fighters Housing Assistance Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to provide public housing rental assistance on behalf of a family that has provided law enforcement assistance and is likely to be subject to retaliatory violence. Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to set aside funds for such program.
